page.title: 15INFORMATION SYSTEMS.
page.content: {COUNTY LIBRARY }sends a mobile Library Van into the villages once a fortnight;it is based at Southam,and first started in 1955.The van carries about 2500 books,fiction,non-fiction, books for pre-school children & large type for those with restricted sight. The needs of older children are catered for by the issue of junior County Library Books from School.The Library Van is visited by about 36 people over the three stops in the village,but many people collect books for neighbours and those unable to get to the Library Van.{COMPUTERS} are in use at Compton Buildings,the School,Craftscreen, and in 50% of homes with children.Knights Haulage Firm controls its lorry fleet by radio as does the Fire Service & a local Tyre Firm.75% of people have access to telephones,& local radio relays news.
